title: [Blade Runner](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0083658/)
comments: A poignant examination on what defines humanity compared to an android.

title: [The Lord of the Rings](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0120737/)
comments: A wonderful adaptation of Tolkien's masterpiece.

title: [The Truman Show](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0120382/)
comments: A psychological horror of what humanity can justify as "entertainment" and man's desire to meet his creator.

title: [Pirates of the Caribbean Trilogy](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0325980/)
comments: A feel-good trilogy of piracy with surprising depth.

title: [The Secret Life of Walter Mitty](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0359950/)
comments: A great movie on the value of an "ordinary" life.
